content: That sounds like an amazing road trip! I think I'll definitely consider Paso Robles and Napa Valley, as I've never been to those areas before. I'm particularly interested in the scenic drives and hot air balloon rides you mentioned. Since I've already been to Carmel-by-the-Sea, I might skip that part and head straight to Paso Robles. Do you know if there are any wine festivals or events happening in Paso Robles or Napa Valley during the summer months?
